original_title: The Knack... and How to Get It
overview: A nebbish schoolteacher begs his smooth (and misogynistic) pal to teach him 'the knack' - how to score with women. Serendipitously, the men meet up with a new girl in town, as well as a friendly lunatic who canâ€™t help but paint things white.
title: The Knack... and How to Get It
